jhelp.util.thread

Class WaitingManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.util.thread.WaitingManager

  • public class WaitingManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager for make waiting task for an specific event before play
    Author:
    JHelp

        Register a task to be play on specific event
        Type Parameters:
        PARAMETER - Task parameter type
        RESULT - Task result type
        PROGRESS - Task progress type
        Parameters:
        threadedTask - Task that wait
        parameter - Parameter to give to task when its time to play comes
        waitingFor - Waiting event
